reviewText: The main reason I bought this DVD was because I have not seen it anywhere as this was a show my Mother watched every day even before I went to school! I was so surprised how clear the pictures were in those days and of course it brought back some great memories with my Mother who is no longer with us ! Was packaged well and super fast! Thanks Amazon
I watched this tv serial in the 60s and was thrilled to find it after all this time. Funny story lines and easy to watch
